comment.author: 66277514@N00
comment._content: The Sun Ripe Date Company was in San Diego which is not really new information here, because these guys were sailing around Southern Cal, but see this reference for Sun Ripe Grape Company wikimapia.org/10768307/Consignment-Boutique For a building of theirs at 226 Atlantic Avenue Long Beach, CA. The photo shows 1315, so Sun Ripe is really no help figuring out where this might be.
